mapper.select: SELECT menu_idx, menu_name, menu_price, menu_category, menu_picture, option1_YN, option2_YN, option3_YN FROM manage_menu WHERE menu_category = #{tabName};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (menu_idx, menu_name, menu_price, count, option1, option2, option3, option_price, active_YN, reg_time) VALUES (#{menu_idx}, #{menu_name}, #{menu_price}, #{count}, #{option1}, #{option2}, #{option3}, #{option_price}, #{active_YN}, now());
mapper.select: SELECT menu_idx, menu_name, menu_price, count, option1, option2, option3, option_price, active_YN FROM cart WHERE active_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY reg_time;
